publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3015 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team—That the Parliament congratulates Rachel Whitbread and Chris Hawkins from the University of St Andrews on winning the annual St Andrew’s Day debating championship, hosted jointly by the Scottish Parliament and the Scottish Government and chaired by the Presiding Officer; further congratulates Rachel on also winning Best Speaker of the Day, and notes that St Andrews once again has shown why it is one of the top universities in Britain.

S3M-3015 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team (lodged on 2 December 2008) Jamie McGrigor*, Jackson Carlaw*, Patrick Harvie*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Bob Doris*, Alex Johnstone*, James Kelly*, Patricia Ferguson*, John Lamont*, Margaret Mitchell*, Gil Paterson*, Tricia Marwick*, Mary Scanlon*, Marlyn Glen*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*, Bill Aitken*, Murdo Fraser*, John Park*, Bashir Ahmad*, John Scott*, Stuart McMillan*, David McLetchie*
S3M-3015 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team (lodged on 2 December 2008) Trish Godman*

S3M-3015 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team—That the Parliament congratulates Rachel Whitbread and Chris Hawkins from the University of St Andrews on winning the annual St Andrew’s Day debating championship, hosted jointly by the Scottish Parliament and the Scottish Government and chaired by the Presiding Officer; further congratulates Rachel on also winning Best Speaker of the Day, and notes that St Andrews once again has shown why it is one of the top universities in Britain. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, Jackson Carlaw, Patrick Harvie, Nanette Milne, Elizabeth Smith, Bob Doris, Alex Johnstone, James Kelly, Patricia Ferguson, John Lamont, Margaret Mitchell, Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mary Scanlon, Marlyn Glen, Bill Kidd, Robin Harper, Bill Aitken, Murdo Fraser, John Park, Bashir Ahmad, John Scott, Stuart McMillan, David McLetchie, Trish Godman
S3M-3015 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team (lodged on 2 December 2008) Jack McConnell*
S3M-3015 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team (lodged on 2 December 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3015 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team (lodged on 2 December 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3015 Congratulations to the University of St Andrews Debating Team (lodged on 2 December 2008) Karen Gillon*
